caller_intent: Albert Ham wants to add a new vehicle (2012 model) to his existing insurance policy, which already includes a 2011 GMC Yukon, and also add his brother Brian Jerome Ham to the policy.
resolution_steps: Confirmed vehicle details (2012 model, loan through Atlas Auto Motors, effective date today).
Obtained bin number and address for Atlas Auto Sales (3715 Renata Road, Nancyville, ZIP 27106).
Reviewed existing coverage (comp/collision deductibles, rental/towing) and confirmed matching coverage for the new vehicle.
Collected Brian Jerome Ham's personal details (DOB: 8/7/1971, DL: 2315282828), confirmed no recent tickets/accidents.
Agreed to email proof of coverage and billing information, and send a copy to sales@atlasautosales.com.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy management (adding vehicles, updating coverage).
Loan and financing details for vehicle insurance.
Data entry for policyholders and additional drivers.
Emailing documentation and coordinating with third-party entities (e.g., Atlas Auto Sales).
systems_referenced: Carrier portal for proof of coverage
summary: Albert Ham added a 2012 vehicle to his existing policy, including loan details from Atlas Auto Motors, and requested his brother Brian Jerome Ham be added as a driver. The agent confirmed all details, reviewed coverage, and agreed to email proof of coverage and billing information. A follow-up was promised if issues arose.
